entries.title: Security Loophole in Google Home Speakers Let Hackers Snoop on Private Conversations
entries.description: Google Vice President Mario Queiroz introducing the new Google Home device during the keynote address of the Google I/O conference in Mountain View, Calif., on May 18, 2016. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg, File)

entries.title: FAA Says It Fixed Computer Issue That Delayed Florida Flights
entries.description: A Southwest airplane takes off at the Tampa International Airport as airports around the country are awaiting for Verizon and AT&T to rollout their 5G technology in Tampa, Fla., on Jan. 19, 2022. (Octavio Jones/Reuters)
